title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Classical Music
purpose: To bring together parliamentarians who have an interest in and wish to further the appreciation and championing of classical music; to act as an interface between British orchestras' on and off-stage activities, the wider classical music industry and key decision makers and opinion formers.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 020 7219 2237.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Hanna Madalska-Gayer, Association of British Orchestras. Tel: 07984 772 390
contact_details.secretariat: Association of British Orchestras acts as the group's secretariat. http://www.abo.org.uk/
